entry.title: One line HTTP server in Ruby or Python
entry.content:
If you need to quickly spin up a web server to just serve static files from your file system, here are two ways to do it:

Ruby

ruby ruby -rwebrick -e'WEBrick::HTTPServer.new(:Port => 3000, :DocumentRoot => Dir.pwd).start'

Python

python python -m SimpleHTTPServer
